target_group: Engineering Students with Strong Academic Performance
introduction: Virtusa Engineering Excellence Scholarship is a prestigious corporate scholarship offered by Virtusa Corporation in partnership with Buddy4Study. This one-time scholarship of ₹50,000 recognizes and rewards engineering students who demonstrate exceptional academic performance and financial need.

basic_requirements: Enrolled in first or second year of full-time B.Tech/BE program
Must be studying at a recognized institution in India
Not a child of Virtusa Corporation or Buddy4Study employee

academic_requirements.description: Strong academic track record with minimum 70% in Class 12

income_criteria.description: Annual family income from all sources must be less than ₹6 Lakh

scholarship_benefits.description: A one-time financial assistance of ₹50,000 to support academic-related expenses.

documents_required: Declaration - Not a child of Virtusa/Buddy4Study employee
selection_process: Application screening based on eligibility criteria
Final selection by Virtusa Scholarship Committee
Direct credit to selected student's bank account
important_notes: This is a ONE-TIME scholarship, not renewable
Children of Virtusa Corporation or Buddy4Study employees are NOT eligible
Only for B.Tech/BE students in first or second year
Family income must be below ₹6 Lakh per annum
Application deadlines are announced on Buddy4Study portal

faq.question: Is this scholarship renewable every year?
faq.answer: No, Virtusa Engineering Excellence Scholarship is a one-time grant of ₹50,000.

faq.question: Can third or fourth year students apply?
faq.answer: No, only first and second year B.Tech/BE students are eligible.

faq.question: What is the application deadline?
faq.answer: Application deadlines are announced annually on the Buddy4Study platform. Check the official portal for current dates.

faq.question: Can diploma students apply?
faq.answer: No, this scholarship is exclusively for B.Tech/BE (full-time degree) students.

data_source: Virtusa and Buddy4Study Official Scholarship Information
